hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Uqbah bin ‘Amir Al-Juhani that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Do not force your sick ones to eat or drink. Allah will feed them and give them to drink.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُكْرِهُوا الْمَرِيضَ عَلَى الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Do not force the sick person to eat
